Name: Fires of Creation
Desc:
Summons the Flame Incarnate. Summons a Fire Lion. Use with the Down key to summon a Flame Fox. Use a custom command to summon a Flame Fox by using the skill and summon a Fire Lion by using it with the Down key.
The Incarnate's blessing temporarily increases MP cost, but makes all your attacks ignore a certain amount of DEF.
Depending on the type of the summoned Incarnate, Orbital Flame I, Inferno Rise, and Blazing Extinction activate a different attack.
Lv. 1 Effect: Can learn the 4 Job skill, Inferno Rise.
Custom Command On/Off: Right-click
